title: Enhancing Business Practical Competencies: Language Proficiency Improvement Course Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education experience and practical experience in elementary education settings
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design instructional strategies that enhance elementary learners' language engagement by over 30% using gamification elements.
Learners can develop at least three types of language education scenarios using simulation-based learning tools.
Learners can apply at least two gamification mechanisms (digital badges, leaderboards, feedback systems, etc.) to actual classroom instruction.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
